title: Switch README to AdminLTE v3
description: Replace AdminLTE v4 content with AdminLTE v3.2.0 (pinned) instructions; commit and push.

title: Add automation scripts
description: Create `scripts/update_todos.py` and `todo.json` to generate `Is_listesi.md` and update README automatically from the todo file.

title: Install git hooks
description: Add `githooks/post-commit` and `scripts/install-hooks.sh` to install hook that runs update script after commits.

title: Verify automation
description: Trigger a sample todo change to confirm `Is_listesi.md` and README update automatically and commit automated changes.

title: Install Laravel skeleton
description: Create Laravel 12.10.1 project skeleton in repo, copy files, install deps, create .env and generate app key.

title: Install AdminLTE v3 and Laravel-AdminLTE
description: Composer require jeroennoten/laravel-adminlte and AdminLTE v3, npm install frontend deps, publish vendor assets, update resources imports and run build.

title: Publish AdminLTE config & views
description: Publish package config and view stubs into `config/adminlte.php` and `resources/views/vendor/adminlte` (manual copy done).

title: Document frontend environment
description: Add Node.js version recommendation and npm build steps to README; consider upgrading Node to 20+.

title: Set filesystem permissions
description: Ensure `storage` and `bootstrap/cache` have correct write permissions on deployment environments.

title: CI / Deployment
description: Add CI workflow to run composer install, npm ci, build assets and run migrations on deploy.

title: Copy AdminLTE dist to public
description: Copy AdminLTE `dist` assets (css/js/img) into `public/vendor/adminlte` and ensure paths in config/layout point to them.

title: Add AdminLTE example views
description: Add partials: `partials/sidebar.blade.php`, auth views, and dashboard card examples under `resources/views/vendor/adminlte`.

title: Kernel: restore default content
description: Replace current minimal `app/Http/Kernel.php` with the standard Laravel Kernel content compatible with the installed framework.

title: AdminMiddleware: role/permission-based
description: Make `AdminMiddleware` use role/permission checks (Spatie) and gracefully fallback to `is_admin` property.

title: Spatie permissions: seeders
description: Add seeder `PermissionSeeder` to create roles/permissions and assign to first user (run during migrations/seeds).

title: config/adminlte.php: richer menu
description: Update `config/adminlte.php` with a richer menu and user settings.
